        Find jobs based on the parameters.
        Parameters:
        id - The job id
        jobName - The job name
        userName - The user who created the job
        statuses - The job statuses
        tags - The tags for the jobs to find
        clusterName - The cluster name
        clusterId - The cluster id
        Returns:
        The specification

        Find jobs that are zombies.
        Parameters:
        currentTime - The current time
        zombieTime - The time that zombies should be marked by
